ti:edition.ti:label: Annales
ti:edition.ti:description: Cornelii Taciti Annalium Ab Excessu Divi Augusti Libri. Tacitus, Cornelius; Fisher, Charles Dennis, editor. Oxford, Clarendon Press. 1906.

ti:translation.ti:label: The Annals
ti:translation.ti:description: Annals of Tacitus. Tacitus, Cornelius; Church, Alfred John and Brodribb, William Jackson, translators. London, MacMillan and Co. 1869. (Modern Library reprint 1942).
